name: angel-connect-site
description: Angel Connect - Первая экосистема для стартапов в Центральной Азии

scripts.prebuild: cp version.js public/ || echo 'Warning: version.js not found'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:main
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:main
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:angelconnect-uz

author: Angel Connect Team
